TcpKnnH 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Setup Environment and Load Required Libraries

    FolderRoot.Rd

    This script sets up the root directories and loads the necessary R packages for processing multi-label datasets, performing clustering, and running classification algorithms.

    FolderRoot

    Format

    An object of class character of length 1.

    Details

    The script defines two main directories:

    • FolderRoot: The root directory where all project-related files are stored.

    • FolderScripts: The directory where R scripts are stored.

    The script also loads multiple libraries required for different tasks:

    • foreign - Reads data from different statistical software formats.

    • stringr - Provides functions for string manipulation.

    • plyr and dplyr - Used for data wrangling and transformations.

    • reshape2 - Assists in data reshaping (melting and casting).

    • AggregateR - Provides aggregation functions for large datasets.

    • lme4 - Implements mixed-effects models.

    • parallel - Enables parallel computing.

    • rJava - Interface for calling Java from R.

    • RWeka - Provides an interface to Weka machine learning algorithms.

    • mldr and utiml - Handle multi-label classification tasks.

    • foreach and doParallel - Support parallel computing workflows.

    • cluster and pvclust - Perform clustering analysis.

    • factoextra - Visualizes clustering results.

    Examples

    # No direct function call needed, simply source this script to set up the environment.
source("setup.R")
#> Warning: cannot open file 'setup.R': No such file or directory
#> Error in file(filename, "r", encoding = encoding): cannot open the connection
